title: Use Digital Twin to Plan Tree Planting
description: A city planner wants to plant new trees and uses the digital twin to ensure they won't conflict with underground utilities.

tasks.description: Select the proposed locations for new tree planting on the digital twin map.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent defines the locations of interest.

tasks.description: Overlay the city's underground utility maps (water, gas, electric) onto the selected locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The digital twin displays the utility lines in relation to the proposed tree locations.

tasks.description: Identify that one of the proposed locations is directly over a major water main and flag it as unsuitable.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the conflict and provides a recommendation to move the tree.
